description: The Magellan RoadMate 1470 includes many premier features, starting with the exclusive Magellan OneTouch favorites menu, QuickSpell with SmartCity search and highway exit point of interest search, to name a few. Magellan's attention to detail delivers a superior user experience. You're ready to travel with preloaded maps and points of interest for the United States, Canada, and Puerto Rico that make the Magellan RoadMate 1470 ideal for both business trips and vacations.
title: Magellan RoadMate 1470 4.7-Inch Widescreen Portable GPS Navigator
